title: 4 shot at house party in south Alabama
content:
Four people were shot and injured while attending a house party early Saturday morning in Enterprise, police say.
Enterprise police said multiple shots were fired on Baxter Street at around 1:42 a.m. Officers arrived on the scene to find dozens of people standing in the street.
The shooting stemmed from a verbal and physical altercation, according to police.
The victims were transported to an unspecified hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
The shooting remains under investigation. Anyone with information is asked to call Enterprise Police Department at 334-347-2222.
